thread.title: Carolina Panthers defeat Philadelphia Eagles 27-16: Live chat recap
thread.title_full: Carolina Panthers defeat Philadelphia Eagles 27-16: Live chat recap | OregonLive.com

author: Erik C. Anderson | The Oregonian/OregonLive
title: Carolina Panthers defeat Philadelphia Eagles 27-16: Live chat recap
text:
Former Oregon Ducks head coach Chip Kelly and the Philadelphia Eagles kick off Week 7 of the 2015 NFL season with a Sunday Night Football matchup against the undefeated Carolina Panthers.
More : TV channel and how to watch this game online
Follow along as we bring you live updates and analysis from the game from kickoff through the final whistle in the comments section below. Have thoughts on how Kelly and his eagles are performing? Don't hesitate to jump in on the live updates and chat with us as the game rolls along.
